alert.note: Alert for Centennial Mountains, Island Park (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 22 at 4:33PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...Thunderstorms developing in the Island Park Basin through 530 PM MDT... At 431 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a developing thunderstorm 9 miles west of Shotgun Village and over Island Park Reservoir. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and occasional lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ponds Lodge, Last Chance, Shotgun Village, Island Park Reservoir, Harriman State Park and Red Rock Pass. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. If on or near Island Park Reservoir and Henry`s Lake, now might be a good time to head to shore and call it a day as active convection is expected to translate through the region this afternoon and evening. .
